full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Portable Spectroradiometer
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3664402856
*   **Expiration Date:** November 9, 2022 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity:** Department of the Environment (ECCC)
#### Brief Overview
Environment and Climate Change Canada requires a portable, high-resolution and full-spectrum field spectroradiometer to further develop vegetation mapping and monitoring capabilities. The Contractor must provide a spectroradiometer, including all hardware, software, and accessories, along with documentation, virtual training, and a one-year warranty covering maintenance and support services.

### Key Requirements

*   The Contractor must provide a portable spectroradiometer capable of meeting all the specifications detailed in this document.
*   The spectroradiometer must support high-resolution and full-spectrum field measurement capabilities.

### Tender Documents and Specifications
The detailed specification and requirements for the Portable Spectroradiometer, Amendment to Closing Time, and other relevant documents are available at CanadaBuys and Ariba Discovery.

### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns regarding this tender opportunity, please contact:
Stephen Van Den Hanenberg
_email: stephen.vandenhanenberg@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca_
